subject: Order now and don't forget about a discount
body:
Dear customer.
Tired of paying twice the price of a med when buying it from a "reliable" licensed USA Web pharmacy? Our discount Canadian e-shop will show you what real "low prices" should look like.
The widest choice of generic medications among all Canadian online pharmacies is waiting for you at CanadianPharmacy. Our prices will definitely please you too. CanadianPharmacy saving on the medications you take can be really safe. Choose the real quality shop for medications at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Best regards,Young Rodrigues
